story: You find yourself in a dimly lit warehouse filled with all sorts of machinery and gadgets. As you explore, you notice a group of robots moving about. What do you do?

actions.action: Try to interact with the robots peacefully
actions.good: To your surprise, the robots respond positively to your peaceful overtures. They reveal the location of a valuable item hidden in their midst. You take it and depart unharmed.
actions.bad: Your attempts at peaceful communication fail miserably. The agitated robots attack you, causing damage. You escape with only minor injuries but leave empty-handed.

actions.action: Try to hack into the robots' systems
actions.good: Using your tech skills, you successfully hack into the robots' systems and disable them. As a reward for your hacking prowess, they reveal the location of a valuable item hidden nearby.
actions.bad: Your attempts at hacking the robots' systems trigger an alarm that alerts the gang members. They rush to investigate, causing damage to you as you try to escape with only minor injuries but leave empty-handed.

actions.action: Try to steal from the robots
actions.good: As you sneak past the robots, you discover a valuable item hidden in their midst. You make off with it unnoticed.
actions.bad: Your efforts to steal the item lead to a confrontation with the robots, causing damage. You manage to escape with only minor injuries but leave empty-handed.
